means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 格皮住所名称，来源于古英语人名Guppa,可能是合成名字的简称，含义是“战斗+光明的，著名的”(battle+bright,famous)

sentence.Network_en: Mr Guppy has no eyes for either of these magnates.
sentence.Network_cn: 格皮先生顾不上看那两位大人物了.

sentence.Network_en: Guppy put on his best clothes and went to the theater.
sentence.Network_cn: Guppy穿上他最好的衣服去了剧院.

sentence.Network_en: The second obstacle is the Guppy Multiple Moving Average term group.
sentence.Network_cn: 第二个障碍是顾比复合移动平均线长期组.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有孔雀鱼(Guppy)若干，换缸，免费赠送。密市，自取。
又称为「古比鱼（guppy）」( Guppy)，此名字的由来，是取于发现此鱼品种的英国人士雷克梅尔.古比的姓氏而起名。他本身是位植物学家，在 …
古比(guppy)是对运送超大货物(如飞机的舱段或运载火箭)的大肚子改装机的昵称。可能是因为它象一种叫guppy的大肚子观赏鱼吧。先看看guppy鱼[此贴子已经被作者于.

list.abs: analysis of behavioral response of guppy fry in optical field ., 孔雀鱼幼苗在光场中的行为反应分析.
孔雀鱼生仔 baby guppies Uploaded: May 4th, 2008 @ 2:15 pm孔雀鱼生仔 baby guppies Author: View dfswhk's Other Uploaded Videos.
among the hundreds of guppy varieties , the best known feature of the male fish is its gorgeous dorsal and caudal fins .成千上百的孔雀鱼品种中，雄鱼最著名的特色就是它们华丽的背鳍和尾鳍。
another excellent source for guppy genetics information until recently has been Junichi Ito in Japan .直到最近在日本出现了另外一位杰出的孔雀鱼基因知识的来源，就是伊藤纯一。

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1920s: named after R. J. Lechmere Guppy (1836–1916), a Trinidadian clergyman who sent the first specimen to the British Museum

entry.tran: 虹鳉（一种颜色亮丽的热带小鱼）
entry.def: A guppy is a small, brightly-coloured tropical fish.

means.word_mean: 1. small freshwater fish of South America and the West Indies; often kept in aquariums
